name: Eteki
description: eTeki is where the world goes to qualify talent. Our award winning technical interviews-as-a-service platform enables organizations across the globe hire the best tech talent, fast. eTeki is poised to disrupt the way IT candidates are hired by giving any company the ability to screen large numbers of tech talent quickly.
features: Take 5 minutes to scope the technical skills you need to assess.
Get your candidate technically validated by a human not a machine.
Watch your candidate and an IT expert talk in a Virtual Interview Studio.
The technical interviewer scores the candidate & sends you a report.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: The Only Global Marketplace for Technical Interviews
ShortDescription: eTeki is on a mission to supply the world with interviews-as-a-service to scale and optimize technical hiring.

Highlights.name: Balancing Your Budget
Highlights.description: Your bottom line doesn’t allow for costly hiring mistakes  – especially in IT. Our cost-effective interviews-as-a-service model can end the heartbreak of last-minute technical disqualification and increase hiring manager satisfaction.

Highlights.name: Save More Time
Highlights.description: Take your time back. We remove the tactical headache of interview scheduling and deliver results that free up your team to focus on other priorities with comprehensive screening completed by people who know the technology.

Highlights.name: Fast-Track Great Candidates
Highlights.description: Technical roles have a less than 1% unemployment rate. You’ll lose the best candidates if you don’t fast-track the assessment process. That’s where our on-demand model comes in.

enhanced_description: eTeki is an award-winning global interviews-as-a-service platform designed to qualify and optimize the hiring of technical talent. It provides human-led technical validations by IT experts within a virtual interview studio, allowing organizations to efficiently screen large numbers of IT candidates. The service streamlines the technical assessment process, freeing up internal teams from interview scheduling and delivering comprehensive reports on candidate performance. eTeki aims to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity by reducing costly hiring mistakes and fast-tracking the assessment of top tech candidates with its on-demand and cost-effective model.
key_use_cases: Technical skill assessment and validation for IT roles
Eliminating last-minute technical disqualifications in hiring
Improving hiring manager satisfaction and productivity in tech recruitment
competitive_advantages: Utilizes a Virtual Interview Studio for assessments
Cost-effective hiring solution for IT roles
On-demand model for rapid candidate assessment
Ability to screen large numbers of tech talent quickly
Removes tactical burden of interview scheduling

Ends costly hiring mistakes, especially in IT
Saves time for internal teams by removing interview scheduling overhead
